General.Name: Song Ho Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Song Ho Industrial Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of various steel products in Taiwan. It offers hard drawn steel, roping, spring, spoke, flat, annealed steel, and galvanized steel wires; and cross lay ropes, fiber core and independent wire rope core (IWRC) parallel lay ropes, elevator wire ropes, IWRC 8 standard elevator wire ropes, profile wire ropes, non-rotation ropes, strands impacted wire ropes, and galvanized steel wire strands, as well as wire ropes for suspension bridges. The company also provides cold drawn steel bars, such as low and medium carbon, free cutting, alloy, and stainless-steel bars; spheroidized wires, including alloy steel, nipple, bearing, low carbon steel, middle-high carbon steel, and cold heading wires; and water-control gate machinery. Song Ho Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 1972 and is based in Nantou City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.61, Nankong 3rd Road, Nantou City, Taiwan
